QuestData.Title: Into the Heart of Madness
QuestData.Description: $n, Nyami ran off to 'take down Teron'gor herself.'$B$BYou need to find her. She has no chance against him on her own.$B$BI must remain here and organize our ranks should another attack fall upon us. I'm counting on you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Soulbinder Nyami at the Seat of Depravity in Gul'rok.
QuestData.RewardText: You have to hurry... Teron'gor just left!
